articles.description: The Springwatch veteran is currently in South Africa where she is living with her family during the lockdown
articles.content:
The presenters of Springwatch say they will miss co-host Michaela Strachan during lockdown, calling her the glue that holds everything together.
Strachan, 54, who has hosted the show alongside Chris Packham since 2011, is in Cape Town, South Africa, where sh… [+1225 chars]

articles.title: Marc Maron pays tribute to late partner Lynn Shelton: “I loved everything about her” - NME.com
articles.description: Actor, comedian and broadcaster Marc Maron has spoken about the death of his partner and collaborator Lynn Shelton, who died last Friday (May 15).
articles.content:
Actor, comedian and broadcaster Marc Maron has spoken about the death of his partner and collaborator Lynn Shelton.
Shelton, director of Humpday and GLOW died last Friday (May 15) of a previously unidentified blood disorder, news of which was confirmed by Ma… [+2516 chars]

articles.title: Watch Brandon Flowers pay tribute to Joy Division during online celebration of Ian Curtis’ life - NME
articles.description: Brandon Flowers has spoken about the influence he drew from Joy Division during an online livestream event to celebrate the life of Ian Curtis
articles.content:
Brandon Flowers paid fresh tribute to Joy Division frontman Ian Curtis last night (May 18) as he took part in a charity livestream event to mark the 40th anniversary of Curtis’ death.
Moving Through The Silence was broadcast online last night, which saw the … [+1935 chars]

articles.description: The pair had been dating for a year.
articles.content:
Gregory Tyree Boyce and Natalie Adejopu were found dead (Picture: Instagram; Summit Entertainment)

articles.title: BTS singer Jungkook tested for coronavirus after visiting restaurant and bar with friends - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a statement, his rep says Jungkook feels 'deeply regretful' he neglected to socially distance himself amid the pandemic.
articles.content:
BTS singer Jungkook has tested negative for coronavirus after getting together with several K-Pop stars in Seoul, South Korea last month.

articles.description: He joins Neve Campbell – and more legacy cast members are in talks. Get the news at Empire.
articles.content:
